About Me

My background...

Current Projects

I have completed a custom bootstrap website for an Architect Practice and am working on building apps for Metier Digital. The first is an in-house to-do app that allows the team to sort projects and tasks by importance and the second is a date planner app that gives the user options of combining current events in their area.

Aside from these I have built several apps and websites as a means of practicing new code. Please check my 'Work' page. I am always learning and am currently partaking in Udemy courses for JavaScript and React.

Education

2:1 Psychology BSc - Roehampton University
